entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as shaking with tears and holding a handkerchief. He is also mentioned as speaking to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is mentioned as getting the kids back in bed.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is mentioned as lying down but says he'll be all right in a jiffy.

entities.name: professor slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is mentioned as saying the Ministry's been informed and representing Slytherin.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as standing up and looking at the group around Bill's bed. She also asks Hagrid to join her in meeting with the Heads of House.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as being in a bed, surrounded by a group of people.

relationships.description: Hagrid informs Professor McGonagall that he has moved Bill.
Professor McGonagall requests to meet with the Heads of House, represented by Professor Slughorn for Slytherin.
